7.3 DUIM-Layouts Module

current-pane

Generic function

Summary

Returns the current pane.

Signature

current-pane => pane

Arguments

None.

Values

pane
An instance of type <sheet>.

Library

duim-layouts

Module

duim-layouts

Description

Returns the current pane: that is, the pane that has the mouse focus.

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
